name: A Bountiful Ocean
text:
[ Skill activation ]
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
[ Effect ]
While "Umi" is face-up on the field, apply the following:
● Non-Effect WATER monsters you control are unaffected by non-WATER monster effects.
● Once per turn, you can add 1 WATER monster from your GY to your hand, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot activate cards or effects, until your Normal Summon that monster or a card with its name.
